children.value: We exhibited our installation in a barn during the

Festival of Chevagny.
We conducted a workshop for children during the day, and grown-ups during the evening.

frontmatter.title: Nouvelles Passions Chevagny
frontmatter.subtitle: Installation & Workshop
frontmatter.description: Installation and Workshops of The Live Drawing Project For Nouvelles Passions Festival 2019 in Chevagny, France
